messages.messageBody:
hi,

i just thought i would pass on some interesting web sites i've stumbled
upon.

http://www.pathsoflearning.com/
We aim to inspire parents, educators, and others interested in
educational policy and practice to consider diverse ways in which
children and adults can gain meaningful, integrated knowledge and
develop their own authentic potentials.

http://www.infed.org/thinkers/default.htm
thinkers
These pages explore the contributions of some of the thinkers central to
the development of the theory and practice of lifelong learning and
informal education.
- this is just one of many pages they have and is the only one i've
begun to check out.

-susan
austin,tx
